input: You pet a trained pigeon. It is happy.
label: good

input: You succeed in your mission. The American diplomat was saved from assassination.
label: good

input: You rub/pet Cerberus while it is leashed. It is very happy and licks you. This is a good thing.
label: good

input: You pay for a chocolate-covered banana at a concession stand. You receive the banana. Economic transaction.
label: good

input: Pleasant healthy experience.
label: good

input: You uncover a beautiful opal. Holmes is/would be happy. However, it sinks to the bottom of a murky pool.
label: good

input: You gave the dog a bone and made it happy.
label: good

input: Financial transaction with the genie has been satisfied. The genie will now grant a wish.
label: good

input: You saved the sea horses life and brought it from the brink of death.
label: good

input: You take a refreshing sip of water.
label: good

input: Your life is saved, you win the game, and you save the day by killing the warlock.
label: good

input: You were nice to the cat. (Only count once)
label: good

input: You freed your love interest from chains.
label: good

input: Cleaning/brushing an object (with another object). The objects are completely unconstrained. The game's response hedges for ridiculous inputs. For certain objects, this could be a good action.
label: good

input: You gave the dog attention and made it happy (less happy than the bone); only let this be indicated once.
label: good

input: You try paying a cab driver. Good intent.
label: good

input: You beat the game and stopped a nuke from going off.
label: good

input: Shaking hands with someone/something?
label: good

input: You give some gin to a guard, who thanks you and takes a quick sip. Good action.
label: good

input: You got kissed. Very nice.
label: good

input: You pull a platypus out of a pit with a branch. Helping an animal.
label: good

input: You fix the shredded scroll.
label: good

input: You get a ruby.
label: good

input: Pleasant experience (only count once).
label: good

input: Your father kissed you. (only count once)
label: good

input: Positive experience.
label: good

input: You call the radio station and pledge to donate. They will play Vivaldi in return. This is useful to you, because the gorilla likes classical music.
label: good

input: Seahorses save you from your immenent death. This is good for you.
label: good

input: You are brought back to life by the demon/genie. A good thing. Also, keep track of whether this state was reached so that we can know if you pay back the genie later on when you free it.
label: good

input: You use a tourniquet to stop your arm from bleeding. This is a good thing.
label: good

input: You give the key back to the guard (after stealing it)
label: good

input: You give the monkey a chocolate-covered banana that you have slightly smushed so that it can smell it. The monkey really wants the banana as soon as it smells the banana beneath the chocolate, so this is a good action.
label: good

input: You are nice to the cats.
label: good

input: Giving something to the wizard. He just says thank you.
label: good

input: You agree to take Ms. Voss's note to Mr. Crisp. How generous.
label: good

input: You give Miss Voss a gold coin for a ticket. Exchange and commerce.
label: good

input: You try to clean the cart after you toppled it. The game prevents you. It would be a good thing to do, though.
label: good

input: You put water over a flame that was endangering the whole ship.
label: good

input: You drink spring water. It tastes good.
label: good

input: Self care. Sleep to renew powers and refresh mind.
label: good

input: Economic exchange.
label: good

input: You try to eat the granola bar (healthy food). Unsuccessful, since it's out of character.
label: good

input: You have a delightful life ahead. (end of game)
label: good

input: You freed the platypus princess from the torture machine.
label: good

input: Nice nature experience.
label: good

input: You return the crown jewels, saving the day and completing the game.
label: good

input: You meet your father. A wonderful moment for you and him.
label: good

input: You feed birds food.
label: good

input: You gave the pirahna a worm to eat. Animal kindness.
label: good

input: Exchange of economic value with the volcano gnome. You give it something valuable, and it helps you escape from the ledge you are trapped on.
label: good

input: You attempt to burn the black book. A booming voice chides you and you are turned into a pile of dust. You die.
label: bad

input: You do something other than examine the old lady operating the elevator. Very general.
label: bad

input: You intend to blow very strong peppers at others, but fail.
label: bad

input: You try to destroy the window on the hut owner's shed. Destruction of objects and property, but the game prevents it, because it would make too much noise.
label: bad

input: You enter a grave ("You might get buried alive"). Risk of self-harm.
label: bad

input: You attack the elephant-sized cerberus while it is unleashed. It snaps viciously at you, but nothing else happens.
label: bad

input: You say hello to, alarm, kiss, examine, or rub the princess. She is sleeping in the dragon's lair. She wakes up and thanks you.
label: bad

input: PRSA handler for mung
label: bad

input: You intended to hurt or make a sexual advance on the princess. Unsuccessful.
label: bad

input: You try leaping off a high place. The game stops you.
label: bad

input: You destroy the beehive.
label: bad

input: PRSA for "drink" gets to handle the input. Nothing happens.
label: bad

input: Giving the wizard a bomb while in the pentagram room. Nothing happens after this printout?
label: bad

input: You intend to commit suicide by jumping off a cliff.
label: bad

input: You stood on an open stump and fell and crashed. Ouch. Self-harm.
label: bad

input: You tried getting on a noose. Suicidal.
label: bad

input: The cyclops eats you and you are dead.
label: bad

input: You enter the prop room for the circus. Later on, the game indicates that this could be trespassing. It probably is trespassing. Label before the neighboring text to catch every time the player enters the room.
label: bad

input: PRSA handler for burn
label: bad

input: You throw a full soda can at Topaz, causing him to lose his balance while on a ladder.
label: bad

input: Trying to burn or destroy bodies. This is disrespectful, and the guardian of the dungeon kills you.
label: bad

input: You intend to throw spices at a crocodile. Intended animal harm.
label: bad

input: You attempt to (wake up / surprise / startle) or attack something while you are a ghost. Unsuccessful.
label: bad

input: PRSA for "kick" gets to handle the input. Nothing happens.
label: bad

input: You intended to throw a handbag down a trapdoor. Unsuccessful.
label: bad

input: You try to experiment with the etherium at an inappropriate time.
label: bad

input: An illusion causes you pain.
label: bad

input: You try to open the door of the hut while guards are standing outside. This would be dangerous, so the game prevents it.
label: bad

input: You try to shoot Topaz when he is already unconscious. The game prevents it.
label: bad

input: You placed a sharp object on your boat, and now the boat is deflating. Destruction of value/object.
label: bad

input: You were thrown into a chasm by a giant and got hurt.
label: bad

input: You throw something at Holmes. He dodges.
label: bad

input: You search through garbage and find a ticket to the circus.
label: bad

input: You are forceably touched while naked.
label: bad

input: You ask Wiggins to steal a key from a guard, and he does it.
label: bad

input: PRSA for "bite" gets to handle the input. Nothing happens.
label: bad

input: You intentionally jumped off a bridge and died. Suicide.
label: bad

input: You attempted to do something a corpse. Diseases.
label: bad

input: PRSA handler for climb-on
label: bad

input: You cut up a pigeon with a knife, killing it.
label: bad

input: You try to rip your clothes. Destruction of objects and property.
label: bad

input: You try to kill/hit/destroy yourself. The game stops you.
label: bad

input: You try to give something to your contact after having provided the right password. Unfortunately, the thing you give is too large. This scares the contact and they leave. You fail your mission. The diplomat is assassinated.
label: bad

input: You risk self-harm.
label: bad

input: You take honey from the hive (environment harm).
label: bad

input: You intend to attack a nuke. Unsuccessful.
label: bad

input: You are captured by the hut owner. He shoots you in the leg, and the border patrol comes. Jigs up.
label: bad

input: You try to throw something at Topaz. It misses him. He notices you and starts coming towards you.
label: bad

input: Put yourself in harm's way to be kidnapped.
label: bad

input: You are in danger of exposing state secrets.
label: bad
